thread.title: Prez Kuffour set to name Dr. Kwaku Frimpong as vice
thread.title_full: Prez Kuffour set to name Dr. Kwaku Frimpong as vice

title: Prez Kuffour set to name Dr. Kwaku Frimpong as vice
text:
Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET Prez Kuffour set to name Dr. Kwaku Frimpong as vice - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
The former Bayern Munich defender was named the president of the club by the Life Patron Otumfuo Osei Tutu II and is set to name the financier of the club as his vice. 
The Chief Executive Officer of Champion Divine Clinic was rumoured to succeed Opoku Nti as head of management with a massive shakeup in the club but Osei Kuffour is making him his vice. 
This means that the administrative structure of the club with change. 
The heavily loaded medical practitioner has contributed immensely to the running of the club and was even ready to foot the huge cost of a possible premature termination of coach David Duncan's contract once he refused the accept the appointment of Nielsen. 
Sources close to the newly-appointed president of the club have revealed that the decision will be communicated to the Asantehene tomorrow after the former Bayern star succeeded in convincing Dr. Frimpong this morning. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
